name: Shoot 1.0
description:
This is a Shmup I made over 10 years ago. It's simple, shoot the red guys, dodge the orange bullets, collect the green and blue stuff for power ups. Your shield is yellow on the right. Stop firing to recharge your shield and attract stuff faster.

It should run on any windows machine, as it's written in c++ and opengl, but I make no guarantees.
